file_content.text: I've been expecting you. Welcome to our enclave.
You're the first Sith to grace these halls with your presence. And the last.
I can sense your hatred. It fuels your power, but it's also killing you.
Finally I meet the Empire's infamous bounty hunter. Disgusting.
It's not every day Imperial operatives defile our halls. Allow me to show you out.
You've caused quite the disruption on our planet. I'm afraid your bloody campaign ends here.
The Green Jedi only want Corellia's freedom. Tell Darth Decimus the rebellion can't be killed. Then leave this planet forever.
You've already slipped up, Ramos. I'll crush your entire Council, and Corellia will be ours.
That's never happening.
You can't intimidate me, Sith!
You're terrified, and you should be. Soon this enclave will be smoldering ash.
I sense your fear, Ramos.
You can do no such thing!
The Empire has your enclave surrounded. We will take it, by whatever means necessary.
Don't be foolish.
You cold, heartless...!
I'm only leaving when you're cooling on the Council chamber floor.
Not a chance.
You're a terrible host, Master Ramos. I just want to chat with your Council.
Show some hospitality.
You murdered Master Bedoch and stormed our enclave! How foolish do you think I am?
I'm going to kill you, Ramos.
I'll bury you first!
Master Ramos...?
There is no emotion, there is peace.
Stop your Jedi nonsense, Ramos!
General Hesker! And Corellia's latest turncoats. This changes nothing.
General Hesker! How good of the Emperor to loosen your leash.
To arms, Jedi. Preserve the Republic, protect Corellia!
